text: Cascades is a region in Burkina Faso. The capital city is Banfora. It was created on 2 July 2001. Two provinces, Comoé and Léraba, make up the region. The Cascades de Karfiguéla give the region its name. Category:Regions of Burkina Faso Category:2001 establishments in Africa
title: Cascades Region
